metadata.title: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 7u51 and 8 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Libraries
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 7u51 and 8, and Java SE Embedded 7u51, allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Libraries, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-0432 and CVE-2014-0455.

criteria.comment: Determine if the version of Java Runtime Environment equals 1.7.0:update_51

criterion.comment: Determine if the version of Java Runtime Environment equals 1.7.0:update_51

extend_definition.comment: Java SE Runtime Environment 7 is installed

criteria.comment: Determine if the version of Java Runtime Environment equals 1.8.0

criterion.comment: Determine if the version of Java Runtime Environment equals 1.8.0

extend_definition.comment: Java SE Runtime Environment 8 is installed
